label: Toxicity Filter
description: Filter compounds based on SMILES data and ADMET predictions.

defaultInputs.name: Input Compounds
defaultInputs.tooltip: Table of compounds including at least a SMILES column and basic properties.

defaultOutputs.name: HIA
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Human Intestinal Absorption prediction: Low, Mod (Moderate), High, or Var (Variable).

defaultOutputs.name: Caco-2
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Caco-2 cell permeability prediction: Low, Mod (Moderate), High, or Var (Variable).

defaultOutputs.name: Solubility
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Aqueous solubility prediction: Low, Mod (Moderate), High, or Var (Variable).

defaultOutputs.name: BBB
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Blood-Brain Barrier penetration: Yes, No, Low, or Var (Variable).

defaultOutputs.name: PPB
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Plasma Protein Binding: Low, Mod (Moderate), High, or Var (Variable).

defaultOutputs.name: Clearance
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Metabolic clearance prediction: Low, Mod (Moderate), High, or Var (Variable).

defaultOutputs.name: CYP Inhibition
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Cytochrome P450 inhibition: Yes or No.

defaultOutputs.name: RM Risk
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Reactive Metabolite risk: Yes or No.

defaultOutputs.name: hERG
defaultOutputs.tooltip: hERG channel inhibition risk: Neg (Negative), Weak, Pos (Positive), or Var (Variable).

defaultOutputs.name: Genotoxicity
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Genotoxicity prediction: Neg (Negative), Pos (Positive), or Var (Variable).

defaultOutputs.name: Acute Toxicity
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Acute toxicity prediction: Low, Mod (Moderate), High, Extreme, or Var (Variable).

defaultOutputs.name: Repeat Toxicity
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Repeated dose toxicity prediction: Low, Mod (Moderate), High, Extreme, or Var (Variable).

defaultOutputs.name: Developmental/Reproductive
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Developmental and reproductive toxicity: Yes, No, or Var (Variable).

defaultOutputs.name: Endocrine
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Endocrine disruption potential: Yes, No, Possible, or Var (Variable).

defaultOutputs.name: Oral Irritation
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Oral irritation potential: Low, Mod (Moderate), High, or Var (Variable).

defaultOutputs.name: Decision
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Overall toxicity decision: PASS (approved), PASS* (approved with conditions), or FAIL (rejected).

configSchema.label: Admet Prediction Models

options.label: Admet AI - best for fast predictions

configSchema.tooltip: Choose which ADMET engine to use; models trade off speed vs. detail.

configSchema.label: MW Threshold
configSchema.tooltip: Maximum molecular weight (Da) allowed for compounds.

configSchema.label: TPSA Threshold
configSchema.tooltip: Maximum topological polar surface area (Å²); higher TPSA often reduces permeability.

configSchema.label: HBD Threshold
configSchema.tooltip: Maximum number of hydrogen bond donors.

configSchema.label: HBA Threshold
configSchema.tooltip: Maximum number of hydrogen bond acceptors.

configSchema.label: RotB Threshold
configSchema.tooltip: Maximum number of rotatable bonds (flexibility proxy).
